Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "SVG Children in Component template not parsed correctly" (#7019) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
2.5.3

### Reproduction link
[https://codepen.io/thephpjo/pen/yPVbMm](https://codepen.io/thephpjo/pen/yPVbMm)

### Steps to reproduce
1. Create a new component
2. Use a `<svg>` element in that component

### What is expected?
The SVG should be rendered the same way it is rendered, if there was no component.

### What is actually happening?
The SVG is not rendered correctly - in the example the size of the circle seems to be disconnected from the viewbox of the svg element.

---
In the codepen, I also managed to reproduce the issue when generating the SVG from Javascript. I assume that this is the same issue, as Vue templates will likely be parsed in a similar fashion.

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Class methods lost when object passed to a scoped slot" (#7021) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
2.5.3

### Reproduction link
[https://jsfiddle.net/smyv26u2/](https://jsfiddle.net/smyv26u2/)

### Steps to reproduce
Uncomment the price with VAT.

### What is expected?
The second list should also display the price with VAT

### What is actually happening?
There is an error in the console:
```
TypeError: product.priceWithVat is not a function
```

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "router-link with query won't be active if url has no query" (#1871) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[https://jsfiddle.net/xgrjzsup/4169/](https://jsfiddle.net/xgrjzsup/4169/)

### Steps to reproduce
```vue
<router-link :to="{name: 'Foo', query: {a: 1}}">Go to Foo With Query</router-link>
```

```css
.router-link-active {
  color: red;
}
```
the url is `/foo`

### What is expected?
Both `/foo` and `/foo?a=1` can make the link active.

### What is actually happening?
Only `/foo?a=1` can.

---
Both `/foo` and `/foo?a=1` can make the link active in vue-router 0.7

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Vuex state and computed values are not in sync" (#1051) at vuejs/vuex
Events.RelatedBody:
When I submit a form, I do an axios call to api and return all entries, example posts.
Now in devtools i see all data coming from api is store in state, but not in component tab.

Also when I start to type in same form, i can see computed value getting lastest state store.

What could be cause of the problem?
